mapper.select: select ID, WORD_TYPE, WORD_CODE, WORD_NAME, REPLACE_WORD, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER, IS_USE from WORKHUB_IWORK.ZZ_DICTIONARY_WORDS where ID = #{id}
select ID, WORD_TYPE, WORD_CODE, WORD_NAME, REPLACE_WORD, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER, IS_USE from WORKHUB_IWORK.ZZ_DICTIONARY_WORDS
mapper.insert: insert into WORKHUB_IWORK.ZZ_DICTIONARY_WORDS(ID,WORD_TYPE, WORD_CODE, WORD_NAME, REPLACE_WORD, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER,IS_USE) values (#{id},#{wordType}, #{wordCode}, #{wordName}, #{replaceWord}, #{createTime}, #{createUser}, #{updateTime}, #{updateUser}, #{isUse})
mapper.update:
update WORKHUB_IWORK.ZZ_DICTIONARY_WORDS
WORD_TYPE = #{wordType},
WORD_CODE = #{wordCode},
WORD_NAME = #{wordName},
REPLACE_WORD = #{replaceWord},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime},
CREATE_USER = #{createUser},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime},
UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser},
IS_USE = #{isUse},
where ID = #{id}
